1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: wn_shell.c Sun 11-19-2000 10:50:41 pm HvA V1.00 $
3    | ***************************************************************************/
4    | 
5    | #include <stdlib.h>
6    | #include "video/v_video.h"
7    | #include "window.h"
8    | 
9    | extern SCREEN _cursvar;
10   | 
11   | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
12   |    FUNCTION: wn_shell()
13   |     PURPOSE: Calls operating system shell with a command
14   |      SYNTAX: wn_shell(int wait, char *command);
15   | DESCRIPTION: Creates a full-sized window and performs the given command.
16   |     RETURNS: Nothing
17   |     VERSION: 920224 V0.1
18   | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
19   | void wn_shell(char *command)
20   | {
21   |   WINDOW *OS_window;
22   | 
23   |   OS_window = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,
24   |                       _desktop_att,_desktop_att);
25   |   wn_clear(OS_window);
26   |   v_cursoron();
27   |   printf("Return to simulation program with 'exit' ...\n\n");
28   | 
29   |   /*  MUST USE SPAWN IN THE FUTURE */
30   | 
31   |   system(command);
32   |   OS_window = wn_close(OS_window);
33   | }
